# Chrome Web Store listing checklist

## Graphic assets (generated by `npm run store:assets`)

- Store icon (128×128): `store/store-icon-128.png`
- Screenshots (PNG, no alpha):
  - `store/screenshot-1-basket-1280x800.png`
  - `store/screenshot-2-settings-1280x800.png`
  - `store/screenshot-3-popup-640x400.png`
- Small promo tile (440×280): `store/small-promo-440x280.png`
- Marquee promo tile (1400×560): `store/marquee-promo-1400x560.png`

## Global assets

- Global promo video (YouTube URL): TODO (upload a persona MP4 from `artifacts/persona-videos/` and paste the URL)

## Additional fields (suggested)

- Homepage URL: `https://github.com/emmett08/open-basket-network-extension`
- Support URL: `https://github.com/emmett08/open-basket-network-extension/issues`
- Official URL: (optional) same as homepage, or your owned domain
